mapper.update: update role set role_name = #{role_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_role_id = #{parent_role_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_remark = #{role_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, app_ids = #{app_ids,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, button_ids = #{button_ids,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where role_id = #{role_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select role_id, role_name, parent_role_id, role_remark, app_ids, button_ids from role
